mapper.sql: film_id, film_name, stars, duration, info, grage, people_num, film_status, covers, language, other_stats
mapper.delete: update film set film_status="delete" where fid=#{fid}
mapper.insert: insert into film (film_id, film_name, stars, duration, info, grage, people_num, film_status, covers, language, other_stats) values (#{filmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stars,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{peopleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filmStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{covers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherStats,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

film_name = #{filmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
